faculties_accepted: All faculties except Business and Design & Environment for UU
module_restrictions: You can only read courses from a maximum of two faculties. At least half of your courses should be at the main UU faculty of your choice. Bachelor-level courses are widely available in English. Access to graduate courses is assessed on a case-by-case basis. Only courses in Biomedical Sciences are available to exchange students for UMCU.
visa_info: Information about immigration-related issues is available at: https://www.uu.nl/en/education/exchange-and-visiting-students/arriving-and-living/practical-matters. Additionally, you can contact the Dutch embassy in Singapore if you have a specific enquiry that the host university is unable to address.
accommodations_info: Information about student housing is available at: https://www.uu.nl/en/education/exchange-and-visiting-students/arriving-and-living/finding-accommodation
cost_of_living: The Netherlands uses the Euro for its currency. Information about the cost of living and estimated expenses in Utrecht is available at: https://www.uu.nl/en/education/exchange-and-visiting-students/arriving-and-living/costs-of-living
university_description: Utrecht University is a public research university located in Utrecht, Netherlands. Established in 1636, it is one of the oldest universities in the Netherlands.
location_cost_of_living: Utrecht is known to be a relatively expensive city in the Netherlands. However, it is still cheaper compared to cities like Amsterdam and Rotterdam.
location_weather: Utrecht experiences a moderate maritime climate with mild winters and cool summers, but also with occasional cold spells as well as heat waves.
location_description: Utrecht is a charming medieval city located in the central Netherlands.
location_crime: Utrecht is generally a safe city, but petty crimes such as pickpocketing and bike theft can occur. It is always advisable to be cautious and aware of your surroundings.
location_transportation: Utrecht has well-maintained and efficient public transportation with buses, trams, and trains. Bikes are also a popular mode of transportation in the city.
location_halal: Halal food options are available in Utrecht.
location_vegetarian: Vegetarian food options are available in Utrecht.
